# discord_voice_regions (Data Source)

Use this data source to get a list of available voice regions.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# List all available voice regions
data "discord_voice_regions" "all" {}

output "regions" {
  value = data.discord_voice_regions.all.regions
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `regions` (Attributes List) A list of available voice regions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--regions))

<a id="nestedatt--regions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `regions`

Read-Only:

- `deprecated` (Boolean) Whether this is a deprecated voice region.
- `id` (String) Unique ID for the region.
- `name` (String) Name of the region.
- `optimal` (Boolean) True for the closest server to the current user's client.
